languages.text: "Думаю, в ней меньше кровопролития, чем в твоей. Я установил{mf||а} мир в Просторе — успокоил{mf||а} пламень веры Инцендии и остановил{mf||а} Каллигоса от падения во зло. Мы с ним даже смогли стать друзьями. Я дал{mf||а} приют беженцам-эльдарам и объединил{mf|ся|ась} с ними, чтобы дать отпор друкари. Объявил{mf||а} помилование тем пиратам и отщепенцам, что были не злодеями, но непонятыми изгоями. Калькасар назвал меня ерети{mf|ком|чкой}, но никто не поддержал эту анафему".

"I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, в ней меньше кровопролития, чем в твоей. Я установил{mf||а} мир в Просторе — успокоил{mf||а} пламень веры Инцендии и остановил{mf||а} Каллигоса от падения во зло. Мы с ним даже смогли стать друзьями. Я дал{mf||а} приют беженцам-эльдарам и объединил{mf|ся|ась} с ними, чтобы дать отпор друкари. Объявил{mf||а} помилование тем пиратам и отщепенцам, что были не злодеями, но непонятыми изгоями. Калькасар назвал меня ерети{mf|ком|чкой}, но никто не поддержал эту анафему".

traits.locale_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to darkness. We even became friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to push back the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to the castigation."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « Je pense que le sang y coule moins abondamment que dans la vôtre. J'ai apporté la paix aux Étendues, apaisé les flammes du zèle d'Incendia et empêché Calligos de sombrer dans l'infamie. Lui et moi avons même réussi à devenir amis. J'ai abrité les réfugiés aeldaris et les ai convaincus de nous prêter main-forte pour repousser les Drukharis. J'ai accordé mon pardon aux pirates et aux renégats qui s'étaient égarés non par méchanceté, mais parce qu'ils n'avaient nulle part où aller. Calcazar m'a {mf|traité|traitée} d'hérétique, mais personne n'a prêté attention à ses critiques. »
languages.original_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que le sang y coule moins abondamment que dans la vôtre. J'ai apporté la paix aux Étendues, apaisé les flammes du zèle d'Incendia et empêché Calligos de sombrer dans l'infamie. Lui et moi sommes même devenus amis. J'ai abrité les réfugiés aeldaris et les ai convaincus de nous prêter main-forte pour repousser les Drukharis. J'ai accordé mon pardon aux pirates et aux renégats qui s'étaient égarés non par méchanceté, mais parce qu'ils n'avaient nulle part où aller. Calcazar m'a {mf|traité|traitée} d'hérétique, mais personne n'a prêté attention à ses critiques. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Creo que es menos violento que el tuyo. Traje la paz a la Extensión, extinguí las llamas del fervor de Incendia y evité que Calligos sucumbiera a la maldad. Hasta nos hicimos amigos. Protegí a los refugiados Aeldari y les convencí para unir nuestras fuerzas contra los Drukhari. Otorgué perdones a los piratas y renegados que no habían descarriado por maldad sino porque no tenían donde ir. Calcazar me llamó hereje, pero nadie hizo caso a sus acusaciones».
languages.original_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que es menos violento que el tuyo. Traje la paz a la Extensión, extinguí las llamas del fervor de Incendia y evité que Calligos sucumbiera a la maldad. Hasta nos hicimos amigos. Protegí a los refugiados Aeldari y les convencí para unir nuestras fuerzas contra los Drukhari. Otorgué perdones a los piratas y renegados que no habían descarriado por maldad sino porque no tenían donde ir. Calcazar me llamó hereje, pero nadie hizo caso a sus acusaciones».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “我的世界好像没有那么多流血冲突。我为科罗努斯扩区带来了和平，我平息了因森蒂娅炽热的怒火，阻止了卡里戈斯的堕落，我们甚至成为了朋友。我为艾达灵族的难民提供庇护，说服他们与我们联手，共同抵抗黑暗灵族。我赦免了那些海盗和叛徒，因为他们之所以四处劫掠，并非出于恶意，而是因为无路可走。卡尔卡扎说我是异端分子，但没人理会他的责难。”
languages.original_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."

traits.locale_text: “我的世界好像没有那么多流血冲突。我为科罗努斯扩区带来了和平，我抚平了因森蒂娅炽热的怒火，阻止了卡里戈斯的堕落，我们甚至成为了朋友。我为艾达灵族的难民提供庇护，说服他们与我们联手，共同抵抗黑暗灵族。我赦免了那些海盗和叛徒，因为他们之所以四处劫掠，并非出于恶意，而是因为无路可走。卡尔卡扎说我是异端分子，但没人理会他的责难。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「私が流した血はお前たちよりも少ないだろう。私はエクスパンスに平和をもたらし、インセンディアの熱狂の炎を鎮め、カリゴスが悪に堕ちるのを止めた。我々二人は、なんと友人にさえなったのだ。私はアエルダリの難民を保護し、デュカーリを撃退するために力を合わせるよう説得した。悪意からではなく、他に行くところがないが故に迷い込んだ海賊や反逆者たちに恩赦を与えた。カルカサルは私を異端者と呼んだが、誰もその非難に耳を貸さなかった」
languages.original_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."

traits.locale_text: 「私が流した血はお前たちよりも少ないだろう。私はエクスパンスに平和をもたらし、インセンディアの熱狂の炎を鎮め、カリゴスが悪に堕ちるのを止めた。我々二人は、なんと友人にさえなったのだ。私はアエルダリの難民を保護し、デュカーリを撃退するために力を合わせるよう説得した。悪意からではなく、他に行くところがないが故に迷い込んだ海賊や反逆者たちに恩赦を与えた。カルカサルは私を異端者と呼んだが、誰もその非難に耳を貸さなかった」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Weniger Blutvergießen als bei Euch, will ich meinen. Ich habe Frieden in die Ausdehnung gebracht, habe die Flamme von Incendias Eifer beruhigt und Calligos davon abgehalten, der Schändlichkeit zu verfallen. Wir zwei sind sogar Freunde geworden. Ich habe die Aeldari-Flüchtlinge aufgenommen und sie überzeugt, sich zusammenzuschließen, um die Drukhari abzuwehren. Ich habe die Piraten und Abtrünnigen begnadigt, die nicht aus Tücke vom Weg abgekommen waren, sondern weil sie keine andere Möglichkeit hatten. Calcazar hat mich einen Ketzer genannt, doch niemand hat etwas auf diese Geißelung gegeben."
languages.original_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."

traits.locale_text: "Weniger Blutvergießen als bei Euch, will ich meinen. Ich habe Frieden in die Ausdehnung gebracht, habe die Flamme von Incendias Eifer beruhigt und Calligos davon abgehalten, der Schändlichkeit zu verfallen. Wir zwei haben sogar Freunde gefunden. Ich habe die Aeldari-Flüchtlinge aufgenommen und sie überzeugt, sich zusammenzuschließen, um die Drukhari abzuwehren. Ich habe die Piraten und Abtrünnigen begnadigt, die nicht aus Tücke vom Weg abgekommen waren, sondern weil sie keine andere Möglichkeit hatten. Calcazar hat mich einen Ketzer genannt, doch niemand hat etwas auf diese Geißelung gegeben."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Seninki kadar kanlı değil. Enginlik'e barışı getirdim, İncendia'nın gayretli ateşini dindirdim ve Calligos'un kötü yola baş koymasını engelledim. Hatta onunla arkadaş olmayı bile başardık. Aeldari mültecileri korudum ve onları, Drukharileri uzaklaştırmak için güçlerimizi birleştirmeye ikna ettim. Kötü niyetli oldukları için değil, gidecek başka bir yerleri olmadığı için doğru yoldan sapan korsan ve kanunsuzlara af getirdim. Calcazar beni kâfir ilan etti ama kimse verdiği cezaları umursamadı."
languages.original_text: "I think it has less bloodshed than yours. I brought peace to the Expanse, soothed the flame of Incendia's zeal and stopped Calligos from falling to vileness. The two of us even managed to become friends. I sheltered the Aeldari refugees and convinced them to join forces to fend off the Drukhari. I granted pardon to the pirates and renegades who strayed not out of malice but because they had nowhere else to go. Calcazar called me a heretic, but no one paid heed to that castigation."
